label: usedCoordinateSourceSystem
comment: The geographical coordinate source system used for this geographical coordinate.
The geographical coordinate source system used for this specified geographical feature.

rangeIncludes.comment: Properties defining a geographical coordinate source system used in different places around the world to identify locations on the earth.

domainIncludes.comment: A set of geographical coordinates of a specific point such as the longitude, latitude and altitude.
Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
